A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is an Amazing addition to the Star Wars Saga\, and amazing seques to The Force Awakens and a great heartfelt action packed movie! It has fun moments that at times feel like they're too much\, but in the end all is balanced! The action always adds and serves the story even if some secondary plots are not the most exciting! The drama feels real and the revelations are\, to me\, extremely satisfying even if unexpected. If in the end of TFA the place of each character was undefined\, now all of them are in place to the amazing conclusion of this trilogy!
